snippet: A report assessing the nation's ability to respond to terrorist attacks and various disasters found that state and local officials are the most concerned about dealing with cyberattacks. Read more »
abstract: A report assessing the nation's ability to respond to terrorist attacks and various disasters found that state and local officials are the most concerned about dealing with cyberattacks. Read more »

headline.main: U.S. Study Cites Worries on Readiness for Cyberattacks
